arts.ttl: Brennan Johnson shares what Ange Postecoglou told him in the dressing room after going mad at him vs Roma

arts.sum: Ange was asked if he's being hindered in terms of options with the injuries we've got at the moment... It was to put to Ange with the display in the win at City, then creating enough chances to beat Roma, is he going to enjoy games coming thick and fast?

arts.ttl: Ange laments Spurs' wastefulness in Roma draw
arts.sum: Ange Postecoglou lamented his Tottenham Hotspur side's wastefulness in front of goal during their 2-2 draw with Roma in the Europa League on Thursday, but added he still feels his side are in a "strong position" in the competition.

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou adds two Tottenham players to Europa League squad for Roma tie with nine absent
arts.sum: Tottenham have added academy duo Maeson King and Malachi Hardy to their Europa League squad ahead of Thursday evening's showdown against Roma. Spurs have so far added a number of academy players to their B list since starting their Europa League campaign against Qarabag in September.

arts.ttl: Tottenham next five fixtures compared to Man Utd, Chelsea and Aston Villa
arts.sum: Below is a look at Spurs' next five fixtures as well as those of their Premier League rivals. December 8 vs Chelsea (H) at 4.30pm - Premier League

arts.ttl: Tottenham confirmed team vs Roma - Postecoglou makes four changes with strong line-up - football.london
arts.sum: Ange Postecoglou has named a strong Tottenham team to host Roma in the Europa League on Thursday night with only four changes. Rodrigo Bentancur is available though as his seven-match ban is only for domestic matches and he comes into the side along with Archie Gray at left-back and Fraser Forster is in goal in order to start building up his sharpness and rhythm as he replaces Vicario in the months ahead.
